ftbquests.chapter.basics.title: &e&l Getting Started![--&e&l开始!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests0.title: Progression: The Talent Tree[--进度:精英树--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests0.descrip: The &5Talent Tree&r is the most important method of player progression strength.[--&5宝珠树&r是玩家工作强度最重要的方法.--]
You can open the &5Talent Tree&r by pressing &bK&r[--你可以按&bK&r来打开&5宝珠树&r--]

To reassign your talents, use the consumable item &cReset Scroll&f, which refunds all your skill points upon use. The means to acquire a &cReset Scroll&f are unlocked at later stage. [--要重置你的才能,请使用消耗物品&c重置卷轴&f,在使用时将你的所有技能值退款。在稍后阶段解锁了获得&c重置卷轴&f的方法。--]
&eSkill points&f are primarily earned through challenging boss battles, with a max of &656 skills&r in total, all obtainable via quests. [--&e技能点&f主要通过挑战性Boss战斗获得,总共有&656个技能&r,可以通过任务获得。--]
For a comprehensive guide on acquiring &eskill points&f, refer to the &2'Bosses and Skill Points'&f chapter.[--关于获取&eskill Points&f的详细指南,请参考&2'bossses and Skill Points'&f章节.--]
&l&6Unlock Chapter: Bosses and Skill Points[--&l&6解锁章节:Boss and Skill Points--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests1.title: Irons Chests[--铁箱子--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests1.descrip: Craft a &6iron chest&r - upgradeable via the &5Iron Chests&r mod![--制作一个&6铁箱子&r - 可使用&5铁箱子&r mod进行升级!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests2.title: Upgrading: Inventory[--升级:库存--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests2.descrip: &6Sophisticated Backpacks&r andd some of the most useful Backpacks to Minecraft![--&6精致背包&r和一些最有用的背包到Minecraft!--]
To equip a &9backpack&r, click the Equip icon in the &9backpack&r menu.[--要装备&9背包&r,请在&9背包&r菜单中单击装备图标.--]
Once a &9backpack&r is equipped, you can open it by pressing &bB&r[--一旦&9背包&r被装备好,你可以按&bB&r来打开它--]
&9Backpacks&r can be upgraded through several tiers.[--&9背包&r可以通过几个等级升级.--]
To see all &9backpack&r variants, search &d@sophisticated&r in the &eJEI&r search bar.[--查看&eJEI&r搜索栏中的所有&9背包&r变体,搜索&d@softisticated&r.--]
You can find this search bar at the bottom right. [--你可以在右下角找到这个搜索条。--]
Clicking on items in the item list to the right of your inventory will show their recipes and uses.[--将物品列表中的物品单击物品栏右侧将显示它们的配方和使用。--]
You can also press &bR&r and &bU&r while hovering over any item to see their Recipe and Uses[--您也可以按&bR&r和&bU&r并悬停在任意物品上查看它们的配方和使用--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests3.title: &9Welcome![--&9欢迎!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests3.subtitl: Hello and welcome to &6Create Chronicles: Bosses and Beyond!&r[--欢迎来到&6Create Renologies:Bosss and Feyond!&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests3.descrip: &lGreetings, intrepid explorer!&r You've embarked on a grand journey in a realm where creativity meets adventure, where the gears of automation intertwine with the mysteries of magic. Welcome to a world brimming with possibilities![--&l喷射,无畏探险家!&r你在一个充满了创造的冒险,自动化的齿轮与神秘的魔法共鸣的时代开始了一个巨大的旅程。欢迎来到一个充满了各种可能性的世界!--]

Your &2Quest Book&r it's your loyal companion on this epic saga and will guide you through most of the game's progression. Should it ever seem out of reach, simply glance at the top left of your inventory or press F4 to beckon it back to your side.[--您的&2任务书&r是您在这个史诗沙迦上的忠诚伙伴,并将指导您完成大多数游戏进程。如果它看起来无法触及,只需查看您的物品栏左上角即可,或者按 F4 将其击退到您的侧面。--]

As you go through this big place full of challenges and cool things, finishing quests will give you XP and special items. Every step you take, every new thing you find makes your story even better.[--当你穿过这个充满了挑战与冷却的东西的大地方时,完成任务会给你经验与特殊物品。每走一步,你找到的任何新东西都会让你的故事更好。--]

At the heart of our chronicles lies the art of &6Create automation&r. An odyssey of engineering divided into 11 meticulously crafted chapters. Each chapter is a new horizon in your quest for automation mastery, laying the foundation for you to build the most elaborate and awe-inspiring machines known to this world.[--我们的古典核心是&6创造自动化&r的艺术。一个多功能的工程学分解成11个精细制作的章节。每个章节都是你实现自动化掌握的新地平线,为你建造这个世界上最精妙和最吸引人的机器打下基础。--]

If you like the secret world of magic, don't worry—the magic mods are their own special place, not mixed up with the machine stuff. You can dive into magic and make your journey your own.[--如果你喜欢神秘的魔法世界,不要烦恼——魔法模组是他们自己的特殊位置,而不是与机器混合的东西。你可以跳进魔法中,做你自己的旅程。--]

Step into a big, mysterious world full of adventure waiting for you. But be careful – this place is full of dangers. There are many big buildings and tough bosses to fight, and lots of different worlds to explore. Make sure you're ready for the challenges that come your way.[--踏入一个充满冒险的大世界。但请注意,这个地方充满了危险。有很多大建筑和坚韧的Boss可以战斗,并且许多不同的世界可以探索。确保你已经准备好面对你遇到的挑战。--]

Your story is yet unwritten, your legacy undefined. Will you become the master of machines, a wizard of the arcane, or perhaps forge a path unique to your spirit?[--你的故事还没有写入,你的遗迹没有定义。你会成为机器的主人,奥术巫师,还是可能造出你灵魂的唯一道路?--]
&b&lIn Create Chronicles: Bosses and Beyond, your saga awaits!&r&r[--&b&l在Create Renologys:Bosss and Feyond,你的莎莎等待着你!&r&r&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests4.title: &6Always the same[--&6总是一样--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests4.descrip: You know how to punch trees, right? [--你知道如何击打树,对吗?--]
Before you get too invested in all the mods, if you're unsure of what to do, just play some Minecraft. [--在你太投入所有mod之前,如果你不知道要做什么,只需要玩一些Minecraft。--]
Build a house, build a farm, do the usual.[--建造房子,建造农场,照常做.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests5.title: &6Netherite Template[--&6下界合金模板--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests5.descrip: In 1.20, creating Netherie tools and armour has changed. You'll need to find the &dNetherite Smiting Template&r in chests found inside of Bastions.[--1.20中,制作下界合金工具和盔甲已经改变。你需要在堡垒中找到箱子中的&d下界合金射击模板&r.--]
Don't use all your templates in one go as you can duplicate those.[--不要一次使用所有样板,你可以复制这些样板.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests6.title: &6Early Game Flight[--&6近战飞行--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests6.descrip: Looking to soar through the skies without venturing into the End for an Elytra? Consider crafting a jetpack instead.[--想要在空中高飞,而不要为了一个鞘翅而探索末地?考虑制作一个喷气背包。--]
You'll gain access to mechanical crafters in Chapter 3, paving the way for your aerial adventure.[--你可以在章节3中访问机械制造者,为你的空中冒险铺路石。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests7.title: Loot Chests[--战利品箱子--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests7.descrip: We all like finding treasure, and&d Lootr Chests&r make it fun.[--我们都喜欢找到宝藏,并且&d战利品箱子&r让它有趣.--]
These chests give different loot for each player, so you and your friends can all take treasure without taking from each other![--这些箱子为每个玩家提供不同的战利品,所以你和你的朋友都可以在不相互拿取宝藏的情况下拿起宝藏!--]

In these chests, you might find special items called &6Artifacts&r and &aRings of Ascension&r. You can put them in special slots called &bCurios&r for cool powers or skills.[--在这些箱子中,你可以找到特殊物品,名为&6阿蒂法术&r和&a阿松星之环&r。你可以把它们放入名为&bCurios&r的特殊插槽中,以获得冷却的能力或技能.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests8.title: Waystones[--指路石--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests8.descrip: &eWaystones&r can be discovered scattered throughout the world or within villages, offering a fast way to travel across vast distances.[--&e指路石&r可以发现散落在世界或村庄内部,为长距离旅行提供快速方法.--]
Additionally, you might find &atowers in the wild&r, typically housing a waystone at their summit.[--此外,你可能会在野外找到&atawers&r,通常会在他们的山顶放置一个指路石.--]
You can rename a waystone by shift-right-clicking it with an empty hand.[--你可以用空手shift右键单击它来重命名一个指路石.--]
Breaking a waystone yields &d4 Warp Fragments&r rather than the entire block. [--破坏指路石可以产生&d4扭曲碎片&r而不是整个方块.--]
These fragments become useful for crafting a new waystone once you've obtained &8skystone&r from the moon.[--一旦你从月球中获得&8天空石&r,这些碎片就会对制作新的指路石很有用.--]
Keep an eye out for &ewaystones&r early in your adventure, as they significantly ease the exploration of the map.[--在你的冒险早期留意&e指路石&r,因为它们极大地方便了地图的探索。--]
Moreover, there are numerous mods available that introduce various methods of creating teleportation points around the world![--此外,有很多mod可以介绍各种在世界范围内创建传送点的方法!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests9.subtitl: New and legendary weapons[--新的传说武器--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests9.descrip: &cSimply swords&r adds in a brand new arsenal of weapons to play around with.[--&c小剑&r添加了一个新的武器库来玩.--]
It also introduces extremely rare&e Legendary weapons&r with special abilities that are a mystery until discovered.[--它还引入了罕见的&e传说武器&r,在发现之前具有神秘的特殊能力.--]
Experiment with the exciting new types of weapons available.[--用令人兴奋的新类型的武器进行实验。--]
It also has the unique featureset of &3Runic Powers&r, which can be given to weapons via &n&bsockets&r![--它还具有&3符文力量&r的特殊特性,可以通过&n&b秒&r给予武器!--]
Unique weapons have a chance to roll up to &6two sockets&r when looted. [--特殊的武器在被抢夺时有几率滚动到&6两个插槽&r.--]
There are two types of sockets, &bNetherfused and Runefused&r.[--有两种插槽,&b下界和符文消耗&r.--]
To socket a weapon, simply left click on the gem and then left click on a weapon with the corresponding socket type.[--要插入武器,只需左键单击宝石,然后左键单击带有对应插座类型的武器。--]
Note: Gems cannot be removed once socketed.[--注意:宝石一插上就无法移除.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests10.title: Alex's Mobs[--阿历克斯的怪物--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests10.descri: &bAlex's Mobs&r is a mod that adds 89 new mobs to Minecraft. All of these mobs fall into either two categories: most of them are real world creatures, like Grizzly Bears, Roadrunners, Orcas, etc; but some of them are purely fictional, like the Endergade and Bone Serpent. [--&bAlex的怪物&r是一个mod,为Minecraft添加了89个新的生物。所有这些生物都属于任何一种类型的生物:大多数是真实的世界生物,比如灰烬熊、路行者、Orcas等;但有些纯粹是虚拟的,比如末影和骨蛇。--]

All of these creatures fulfill a necessary purpose, and either have unique drops, mechanics or functions, as there are no purely aesthetic creatures. [--所有这些生物都满足了必要的目的,或是具有独特的掉落物、动力或功能,因为没有纯粹的美学生物。--]

&6The Animal Dictionary&r is a very basic guide and documentation of each creature added by the mod, and should provide insight into uses for each of the mobs or their drops.[--&6动物词典&r是该模组添加的每一种生物的非常基本的指南和文件,应该提供每个生物的用途或掉落物的洞察力。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests11.title: Dimensional Dungeons[--维度地牢--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests11.subtit: Gilded portal block[--镶金传送门方块--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests11.descri: Dimensional Dungeons is a mod about creating portals to semi-randomly generated dungeons with different challenges and puzzles for you to solve or fight your way through. To get started you will need gilded portal blocks.[--维度地牢是一个用来创建有不同挑战的半随机生成的地牢的mod,可以让你解锁或战斗。为了开始,你需要金质传送门方块。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests12.descri: Now that we have an inscribed key and our gilded portal blocks, all we need is the portal keystone that will act as our doorway into dimensional dungeons. The image below shows how to set up the portal frame using stone bricks and the portal blocks.[--现在我们有了一个被刻记的钥匙和我们的金星传送门方块,我们需要的只是传送门钥匙,它将成为我们进入维度地牢的门。下面的图像显示如何使用石砖和传送门方块来设置传送门框架。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests13.subtit: Get a blank portal key[--得到一个空白的传送门钥匙--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests13.descri: Blank portal keys can be aquired via crafting, as loot, or from adventurer bounties. They are the key to opening new dimensional dungeons.[--空白的传送门钥匙可以通过合成、战利品或冒险者奖励获得。它们是打开新的维度地牢的关键。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests14.title: Advanced Portals[--高级传送门--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests14.subtit: Advanced Portal Keys[--高级传送门钥匙--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests14.descri: Inside dimensional dungeons you will sometimes find portal setups with banners and portal crown blocks. you can upgrade your own portal using these blocks in order to allow it to use Advanced keys. Keystones wont accept advanced keys unless you have the portal crown blocks, and banners on the gilded portal blocks. You can inscribe an Blank Advanced Portal Key the same way as a normal key.[--在维度地牢中,你有时会找到带有旗帜和传送门皇冠方块的传送门设置。你可以使用这些方块来升级你的传送门,以允许它使用高级钥匙。关键石不会接受高级钥匙,除非你拥有传送门皇冠方块,以及星辉传送门方块上的旗帜。你可以像普通钥匙一样给空白的传送门按键。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests15.descri: Each dimensional dungeon you open will have its own unique name inscribed on the key it belongs to. In order to name a key you must right-click the blank portal key on &6The Key Inscription Station&r.[--您打开的每个维度地牢都会在它所属的钥匙上刻有它自己的独有名称。为了命名钥匙,您必须右键单击&6钥匙命名站&r上的空白传送门键.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests16.descri: The Blank Personal Dimension Key can be inscribed the same as a normal blank key, but when inserted in the keystone will take you to your own empty dimension to build as you please.[--空白个人维度钥匙可以与普通的空白钥匙一样刻入,但当插入钥匙时,会将你传送到自己的空维度中以建造你喜欢的.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests17.title: Map Atlas[--地图地图册--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests17.subtit: Do you need a map?[--你需要地图吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests17.descri: You need to craft a &eempty map&r and use it to get a &cmap&r.[--你需要制作一张&e空的地图&r,然后用它来得到一张&c地图&r.--]
The &d&lAtlas&r&r can be used as both a world map or a mini-map by having the atlas on your hotbar, or in the 'hand' curios slot. [--&d&l阿特拉斯&r&r可以用作世界地图或小地图,方法是在你的快捷栏或“手”Curios插槽中显示地图。--]
By default the atlas will only have the first map used to create it inside it. [--默认情况下,地图将只具有用于制作它的第一张地图。--]
&nBut by adding extra empty maps&r, any place you explore will be automatically filled in and added to the atlas map.[--&n但是通过添加额外的空地图&r,你探索的任何地方都会自动填充并添加到地图集中.--]
To expand the atlas simply add Filled or Empty maps to it via Crafting or Cartography Table.[--为了扩展地图集,只需通过合成或制图桌添加填充或空的地图。--]
You can open the world map by clicking &e\"m\"&r.[--你可以单击&e\"m\"&r打开世界地图.--]
Waypoints can be added by clicking on the waypoint \"red pin\" button or by pressing &e\"y\"&r.[--路径点可以通过单击路径点“红色针”按钮或按&e“y”&r来添加.--]
Hold shift to place a named waypoint or change the color.[--按住shift以放置命名的路径点或更改颜色.--]
While in the placed named waypoint screen you can click on the waypoint icon or use scroll wheel to change its color[--在命名的路径点屏幕上,你可以单击路径点图标或使用滚轮来改变它的颜色--]
Placed waypoints cannot be edited but can be removed by shift clicking.[--放置的路径点不能编辑,但可以通过shift单击移除.--]
You can target a waypoint by pressing click + \"ctrl\".[--你可以单击+“ctrl”来瞄准一个路径点.--]
Targeted waypoints will always be displayed on the edge of your minimap.[--目标路径点将总是在小地图的边缘显示.--]
Death marker  when holding a recovery compass[--手持恢复指南针时死亡标记--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests18.title: Paraglider[--滑翔翼--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests18.descri: Paragliders are a form of simple air transportation. Gliding is slightly faster then walking.[--滑翔伞是一种简单的空中运输形式。滑翔比行走略快。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests20.descri: By putting a Bestiary in a lectern you can paste new pages into it with manuscripts to unlock knowledge of monsters.[--通过在讲台中放入最佳经验,你可以用手稿粘贴新页面,解锁怪物的知识。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests21.title: Old Manuscripts[--旧手抄本--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests21.descri: You can find manuscripts in chests around the world. These are used to uncover knowledge of monsters and beasts in the 'Bestiary'.[--你可以在世界的箱子中找到手稿。这些手稿用于在“蜂箱”中发现怪物和野兽的知识。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests22.title: &l&4The world is dangerous[--&l&4世界很危险--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests22.descri: Dangerous mob spawns, dragon roosts, sea serpents, will spawn anywhere beyond 1200 blocks in any direction. Proceed at your own risk.[--危险生物生成,龙息,海蛇,将在1200个方块外任何地方生成。进行自己的冒险。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests23.title: &aGetting&r &dMagical II&r [--&a获得&r &d魔法II&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests23.descri: &dIron's Spells 'n Spellbooks&r is a magic mod focused around exploring the world to find magic scrolls in order to cast fantastical magics. [--&d铁”符咒 'n法术书&r是一个聚焦于探索世界的魔法模组,以找到魔法卷轴来施放奇异的魔法.--]
Craft the magic scrolls yourself, or seek out mage towers or deadly crypts around the world and take their loot as your own.[--制作魔法卷轴,或寻找世界范围内的法师塔或致命的地穴,并将其战利品当作你的战利品。--]
You will fight more gangerous mobs like &2Necromancer&r, collect brand new resources, and most importantly: &6Cast Powerful Spells!&r[--你会和更多的怪物战斗,比如&2死灵巫师&r,收集新的资源,最重要的:&6死灵强力法术!&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests24.descri: You may quickly notice as your explore your world that you will be finding scrolls. [--你可以在探索你的世界时快速发现你将会找到卷轴。--]
Each scroll contains a spell, similar to an enchanted book. [--每个卷轴都包含一个法术,类似于附魔书。--]

The scroll can be consumed to cast that spell without consuming mana or triggering a cooldown, or brought to the first new workstation added: the Inscription Table.[--卷轴可以用于施放法术,而不会消耗魔力或触发冷却,也可以被添加到第一个新的工作站:编写台。--]
At the inscription table, you are allowed to place a spell book, one either found or crafted, and slot the scroll into it.[--在刻印台上,允许你放一本法术书,找到或制作一本法术书,然后把卷轴放进去.--]
However, depending on the rarity of the scroll (determined by the spell’s level), it may be too powerful for your spell book.[--然而,取决于卷轴的稀有度(由法术等级决定),它可能对于你的法术书来说太强大了。--]
In this case, you need a better spell book.[--在这样的情况下,你需要一本更好的法术书。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests25.subtit: Your first Spellbook[--第一个法术书--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests25.descri: It's hard to keep finding single use scrolls, but by putting the scrolls into a spell book using the inscription table, one can keep using the spell without consuming the scroll.[--很难继续找到单个使用卷轴,但是通过使用刻印表将卷轴放入法术书中,你可以在不消耗卷轴的情况下保留使用法术。--]
Default key is \"v\" to open wheel.[--默认键是打开轮子的“v”。--]
Default cast key is \"c\"[--默认施法键是“c”--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests26.descri: The Arcane Anvil allows you to place 2 scrolls of the same type/level and combine them into the next level up. By placing a weapon and a spell scroll into th Arcane Anvil you can also imbue the effects of the used scroll into said weapon (consumes scroll,) making the weapon able to cast the spell. A Shriving Stone can be used to take off an imbued spell from a weapon.[--奥术铁砧允许你放置2个相同类型/等级的卷轴,并将其结合到下一个等级。通过将武器和法术卷轴放入奥术铁砧中,你也可以将使用过的卷轴的效果注入到上面的武器(收集卷轴),使武器能够施放法术。使用雕刻石可以用来从武器中移除灌注法术。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests27.descri: Runestones are a more rare find in magical structures, and are always found as blank runestones. Using 8 focuses, you can craft a runestone to a specific school, and use your inscribed runestone to craft gear related to that school.[--符文在魔法结构中更罕见,并且总是作为空白符文找到。使用8个聚焦,你可以制作一个符文石到特定的学校,并使用你刻印的符文制作与该学校有关的装备。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests28.descri: Arcane essence is the most common and most important magical material. It can be found in magical structures, or looted from killing magical enemies. Low amounts of it may craft weak magic items, but its primary purpose is to be condensed into Arcane Cloth or Arcane Ingots, and used in more powerful crafting recipes.[--奥术精华是最常见和最重要的魔法材料。它可以在魔法结构中找到,或被从杀死魔法敌人中抢夺。低量的奥术精华可以制作弱小的魔法物品,但主要用途是压缩成奥术布或奥术锭,并用于更强大的合成配方。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests29.descri: Ink can be found in magic structures, such as wizard towers, and is the key to crafting scrolls. [--墨水可以在魔法结构中找到,比如巫师塔,是制作卷轴的钥匙。--]
There are 5 variants, one for each rarity of scroll.[--有5个变体,每个稀有的卷轴都有1个。--]

When using ink in the Scroll Forge, it will allow you to craft a spell of the corresponding rarity, at the lowest level available. If the minimum rarity of a spell is higher than the ink provided, you will not be able to craft it at all, instead needing a higher quality ink to craft its first level.[--当在卷轴锻炉中使用墨水时,它会允许你在可用的最低等级制作一个对应稀有度的法术。如果法术的最小稀有度高于提供的墨水,你将完全无法制作它,相反,你需要更高品质的墨水来制作其第一级。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests30.descri: The Scroll Forge is a new crafting station that allows the player to craft scrolls by using ink, paper, and a focus. [--卷轴锻造台是一个新的合成站,可以让玩家使用墨水、纸和聚焦来制作卷轴。--]
The ink determines the rarity/level, and the focus determines what school of spells you can craft.[--墨水决定了稀有度/等级,而核心决定了您可以制作的法术学派。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests31.title: Why I have less hearts?[--为什么我会减少心?--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests31.descri: You start your journey with &c8 hearts&r, but you can increase your life through skill points or by using &cHeart Containers&r and &aStamina Vessels&r. [--你用&c8心&r开始你的旅程,但你可以通过技能点或使用&c心之容器&r和&aStanaminasselsels&r来增加你的生命.--]
These items can expand your hearts and stamina wheel, respectively. [--这些物品可以扩展你的心和坚毅轮。--]
To get them, you'll need to interact with a &bGoddess Statue&r, usually found when you visit a village.[--要得到它们,你需要与&bGoddess雕像&r交互,通常你在访问村庄时会发现.--]
&e&l&nSpirit Orbs&r&r&r can be found in chests, but they're quite rare.[--&e&l&n魔灵宝珠&r&r&r可以在箱子中找到,但它们非常罕见.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests32.title: Alex's Caves[--亚历克斯洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests32.subtit: New Cave Biomes[--新的洞穴群系--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests32.descri: &eAlex's Caves&r adds in a unique variety of new underground cave biomes with many new interesting mobs and mechanics to play around with. To get started you'll need to find an underground cabin to acquire some cave tablets, as well as a spelunkers table.[--&eAlex的洞穴&r增加了独特的各种新的地下洞穴生物群系,许多新的有趣生物和机械师可以玩耍。为了开始,你需要找到一个地下小屋来获得一些洞穴石板和一个施法台。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests33.descri: By placing a piece of paper and a cave tablet into the spelunkers table, you can play a minigame to unlock some of the secrets the tablet holds.[--通过将一块纸和洞穴石板放入洞穴者工作台,你可以玩一个迷你游戏来解锁石板持有的一些秘密。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests34.title: Magnetic Caves[--磁化洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests34.descri: Acquire a cave codex for the Magnetic caves.[--获得磁化洞穴的洞穴编码。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests35.title: Primordial Caves[--原始洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests35.descri: Acquire a cave codex for the Primodial caves.[--获得原始洞穴的洞穴编码。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests36.title: Toxic Caves[--毒洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests36.descri: Acquire a cave codex for Toxic caves.[--获得一个洞穴编码。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests37.title: Abyssal Chasm[--深渊混沌--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests37.descri: Acquire a cave codex to an Abyssal Chasm.[--获得一个深渊混沌的洞穴编码。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests38.title: Forlorn Caves[--苍穹洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests38.descri: Acquire a cave codex for a Forlorn caves.[--获得一个虚空洞穴的洞穴编码。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests39.title: Visit a Primordial Cave[--造访原始洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests40.title: Visit a Toxic Cave[--造访一个毒洞--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests41.title: Visit a Magnetic Cave[--造访磁化洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests42.title: Visit a Forlorn Cave[--造访虚空洞穴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests43.title: Find an Abyssal Chasm[--找到深渊圣杯--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests44.title: Shaders[--光影--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests44.descri: This pack includes &63 shader packs&r to enhance your gameplay visuals.[--这个包包括&63影包&r来增强你的游戏视觉效果.--]
You can select the shader of your preference by going through &aOptions -> Video Settings -> Shader Packs.&r[--你可以通过&aOptions -> 视频设置 -> 光影包&r来选择你的偏好的颜色.&r--]
Our recommendation for high performance and a style close to vanilla is &bSildur's Enhanced Default&r, although the maximum shadow distance is 7.[--我们关于提高原版性能和风格的推荐是&bSildur的强化默认&r,虽然最大暗影距离是7。--]
For the best visuals, select &bComplementary Reimagined&r.[--对于最好的视觉,请选择&b补充性重塑&r.--]
For a more balanced approach between graphics and performance, select &bMake Up Ultra Fast&r.[--为了在图像和性能之间更平衡的方法,请选择&b制作超快&r.--]
Additionally, you can adjust your video settings to increase the render distance, enhancing your overall visual experience.[--此外,你可以调整你的视频设置,增加渲染距离,增强你的总视觉经验。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests45.title: Calculators[--计算器--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests45.descri: &aCalculators &rare a key to success. With the &dCrafting Calculator&r you can determine how many raw resources a recipe will cost, and how much materials you will need to craft the items in bulk. There is a bit of a &3learning curve&r to the calculator, but it has some helpful tips in it's own UI.[--&a计算器&r是成功的关键.使用&d合成计算器&r,您可以决定配方需要多少原料,以及你需要多少材料才能大量制作物品.对计算器来说有一个&3学习曲线&r,但它在自己的UI中有一些有用的提示.--]
The &2Math Calculator&r works as a general calculator for addition, subtraction, etc.[--&2马斯计算器&r可以作为通用计算器来添加、减法等.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests46.descri: When right clicked it picks a &drandom block&r from your hotbar and places it down.[--右键单击时,它会从你的快捷栏中选择一个&d随机方块&r并把它放下.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests47.title: Clear Armor[--通透护甲--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests47.descri: Want to &eshow off&r your skin rather than whatever armor you're currently wearing? You can create the &aClear Armor&r and put in the &3cosmetic armor slots&r to hide the armor you're wearing![--想要&es卸下你的皮革&r而不是你现在穿的任何盔甲?你可以制作&a纯净盔甲&r,然后放入&3装饰盔甲插槽&r来隐藏你身上的盔甲!--]
You can also show off your items to chat using&3 shift + T&r[--您也可以使用&3shift+T&r来显示您的物品来聊天--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests48.descri: Find something cool in your world, or just want to take a picture to remember the occasion? Take a picture with the &bCamera&r![--在你的世界中找到一些很酷的东西,还是只是想要拍张照来记住这个事件?用&bCamera&r来一张相片!--]

Images can be taken by right-clicking a camera. This brings you to the viewfinder of the camera. Right-clicking again takes an image of the perspective you are currently seeing. Images are saved with the same ratio as your Minecraft window.[--图像可以通过右键单击一个摄像头来获取。这可以将你带入到摄像头的查看器中。再次右键单击一个您当前所看到的位置的图像。图像保存的比例与您的 Minecraft 窗口相同。--]
&6The camera&r is able to apply filters to the image. By sneak + right-clicking the camera a GUI opens where the filter can be chosen.[--&6相框&r可以对图像应用过滤器。通过潜行+右键单击相框,GUI可以打开选择过滤器的地方.--]

&6The album&r can hold up to 54 images. You can add images by sneak + right-clicking the album. You can view the contained images by right-clicking the album. By scrolling up and down or pressing the arrow-up/down key, you can switch the currently viewed image.[--&6相册&r最多可以容纳54个图像。您可以通过潜行+右键单击相册来添加图像。您可以通过右键单击相册来查看包含的图像。通过向上滚动或按下箭头/下键,您可以切换当前查看的图像。--]

&6The image frame&r allows you to place your image in the world. Just place the image frame item on a wall. Sneak + right-clicking the image frame opens a GUI that allows you to resize the frame. Just clicking the resize buttons enlarges the frame in the given direction. If you sneak and click the button the frame will be downsize the frame in that direction. To display an image in the frame right-click it with the chosen image in hand. To remove it from the frame just right-click the frame again.[--&6图像框架&r允许你将你的图像放置在世界上。只需将图像框架项目放置在墙上。潜行+右键单击图像框架打开一个GUI,允许你调整框架大小。只需单击调整按钮在给定方向上扩展框架。如果你潜行并单击按钮,则框架会向这个方向缩小框架。在框架右键单击时,手持所选图像显示图像。要将其从框架中移除,请再次右键单击框架。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests49.subtit: He's not that dumb...[--他没那么笨...--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests49.descri: The &aTarget Dummy&f is pretty self explanatory. You can use this to test how much damage your weapons deal.[--&a目标Dump&f是很好的自我解释。你可以用它来测试你的武器造成的伤害。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests50.descri: Thanks to a mod, the &aTotem of Undying&f can now be equipped in a &etrinket slot&f. This means you can keep your shield in your offhand and not fear death as long as it's equipped.[--多亏了mod,&a不死图腾&f现在可以装备在&etrinket插槽&f中.这意味着你可以把护盾放在副手,只要它装备好就不要害怕死亡.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests51.subtit: A Pain to Make...[--制造的疼痛...--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests51.descri: &cEmpowered Remnants&r are created by melting down unique weapons.[--&c动力残存物&r通过熔融特殊武器制成.--]
They are used in the creation of &9Runefused Gems&r, and &6Netherfused Gems&r.[--它们用于制作&9符文宝石&r和&6下界宝石&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests52.descri: In order to make it, combine a &cEmpowered Remnant&r with a &6Netherite Ingot&r in a Smithing Table.[--为了制作它,在锻造台中将&c充能残存物&r与&6下界合金锭&r结合使用.--]
Click to identify which power you have rolled.[--单击以确认您已经滚动的电源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests53.descri: To make it, combine a &bRunic Tablet&r with a &cEmpowered Remnant&r in a Smithing Table.[--要制作它,请在锻造台中将&b符文石板&r与&c动力残存物&r结合使用.--]
Click to identify which power you have rolled.[--单击以确认您已经滚动的电源。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests54.title: Big Plans[--大型计划--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests54.descri: These Blueprints can be given one or more crafting recipes, which they then apply to your held items whenever you right-click them.[--这些蓝图可以给一个或多个合成配方,当你右键单击时,它们会应用于手持物品。--]

The quickest and most effective way to assign recipes is to locate the recipe in JEI while the blueprint UI is open. Clicking the '+' in the JEI recipe view will transfer the recipe ingredients to the blueprint for you.[--分配配方最快速和最有效的方法是在蓝图UI打开时将配方放在JEI中。在JEI配方查看中单击“+”会将配方转移到蓝图中.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests55.title: House Building Cannon[--房屋加农炮--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests55.descri: With the help of Schematicannons, any .nbt Schematic can be built into your world. Use it to replicate parts of your Building, or even to prepare it in a completely different World ahead of time.[--在蓝图加农炮帮助下,任意.nbt蓝图都可以在你的世界中制作。使用它来复制你的建筑的一部分,甚至可以在完全不同的世界中进行准备。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests56.title: Engineer's Companion[--工程师伙伴--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests56.descri: Especially while building new Contraptions, this gadget is incredibly handy. Instead of filling up your pockets with components, simply pick up the toolbox from the workshop and bring it with you.[--特别是当建造新的装置时,这个小帮手非常有用。与其填满你的口袋,只需从工坊捡起工具箱并将其带回来即可。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests57.title: Keybinds[--快捷键--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests57.descri: Most of the modded keybind are unbided.[--大多数模组按键绑定都未检测.--]
Go to options, controls and bind whatever key you need on your desired button.[--前往选项,控制并绑定您需要的按键.--]
This is to prevent annoying cases were some mods uses the same button.[--这是为了防止一些mod使用同一个按钮来造成烦人的箱子.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests58.descri: A quick way to switch between tools.[--一个在工具之间切换的快速方法。--]
Upgrade with belt pouches in an anvil to increase capacity.[--用铁砧中的腰带袋升级,增加容量。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests59.title: Building Wands[--建筑法杖--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests59.descri: The mod &9Construction Wand&r adds helpful wands that are used when building.[--mod &9建造杖&r增加了建造中使用的有用的魔杖.--]
When right-clicking a face of a block with the wand, it will extend that face out as long as you have the blocks in your inventory.[--当用魔杖右键单击一个方块的面时,它会扩展那个面,只要你背包里有方块.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests60.title: Preventing Mob Spawns[--防止怪物生成--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests60.descri: When placed, the &9Mega Torch&r prevents all hostile mobs from naturally spawning in a 86 block radius.[--放置时,&9超级火把&r可以防止所有敌对生物在半径86格内自然生成.--]
Great for stopping hostile spawns in dark parts of your base![--非常适合在你的基地的黑暗部分停止敌对生物的生成!--]
You can also see your light levels by pressing F7[--你也可以按F7来看到光照等级--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests61.title: Our First Pick[--我们的第一个选择--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests61.descri: Whether you are an experienced modded player, or a complete noob to MC, everyone has to make a &2Wooden Pickaxe&r.[--无论你是一个经验渊博的modd玩家,还是一个完整的MMCnob,每个人都必须制作一个&2Woden镐&r.--]
Pickaxes allow you to break most stone and metal blocks. This wooden one won't last long, so make sure to gather some &3Cobblestone&r with it![--镐可以让你破坏大多数石头和金属方块。这个木制方块不会持续很久,所以确保用它收集一些&3圆石&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests62.title: Grab some stone[--抓住一些石头--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests62.descri: With our Wooden Pickaxe, stone shouldn't be a problem to break![--用我们的木镐,石头应该不会被破坏!--]
You'll also want to upgrade your pickaxe to stone to mine better ores like &bIron&r![--您还想要将镐升级为石头来开采更好的矿石,比如&b铁&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests63.title: Metals[--金属--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests63.descri: I'm going to assume you've been out mining, right? It is &4Minecraft&r after all.[--我推测你已经出去挖矿了,对吗?这毕竟是&4inecraft&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests64.title: An &aIron&r Pick[--&a铁镐&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests64.descri: The next step of progression is to make an Iron Pickaxe.[--下一阶段是制作铁镐。--]
This pickaxe can mine some of the rarer ores in the game, including Diamond![--这把镐可以开采游戏中一些稀有矿石,包括钻石!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests65.title: &aGetting&r &dMagical I&r [--&a获得&r &d魔法I&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests65.descri: With basic iron tools, you can get started on a brand new adventure into &dMagic&r using the mod &6Ars Nouveau&r.[--使用基本的铁工具,你可以开始新的冒险,进入&d魔法&r,使用mod &6Ars Nouveau&r.--]
Creating this &2Novice Spellbook&r allows you to create beginner spells like casting projectiles to mine or damage mobs.[--制作这个&2初学者法术书&r可以让你制作初学者法术,比如投掷弹丸来挖矿或伤害生物.--]
To learn more about the mod, check out the documentation in the Book![--要了解更多关于mod的信息,请查看书中的文档!--]
Default key is \"v\" to open wheel.[--默认键是打开轮子的“v”。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests66.title: &2Archaeology&r![--&2神秘魔法&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests66.descri: &2Achaeology&r is a brand new feature for MC v1.20 that allows a player to find items inside of &aSuspicious&r blocks like Sand and Gravel.[--&2Achaelogy&r是MC v1.20的新功能,允许玩家在&a可疑&r方块中找到物品,如沙子和沙砾.--]
These blocks can be found in various structures like Warm Ocean Ruins, Desert Pyramids, Desert Wells, and the brand new &eTrail Ruins&r.[--这些方块可以在各种结构中找到,比如暖海遗迹、沙漠金字塔、沙漠水井和新的&e铁轨遗迹&r.--]
To uncover an item from a Suspicious block, you need to create a &aBrush&r to brush away the block to unveil an item.[--要从可疑的方块中发现物品,你需要制作一个&a刷子&r来刷新的方块来显示物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests67.title: &dArmor Trims&r[--&d盔甲饰品&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests67.descri: &aSmithing Templates&r are brand new items used to add trims to your armor! This can be done in Smithing Tables.[--&a筛网模板&r是用来为护甲添加精致的新物品!这可以在锻造台中完成.--]

While they do have a recipe, most of the trims are rare finds in from loot chests or archaeology digs. Once you find one, you can dupe the Template by using the recipe to create more![--它们确实有一个配方,但大多数配方在战利品箱或考古挖掘中是罕见的。当你找到一个,你可以使用配方来制作更多!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests68.title: &aThe&r &5Sniffer&r[--&aThe&r &5筛子&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests68.subtit: Scruff McGruff's Distant Cousin[--Scruff McGruff 的远古表情--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests68.descri: To find this egg, you'll need to brush away &aSuspicious Sand&r in Warm Ocean Ruins.[--要找到这颗鸡蛋,你需要在温暖的海洋遗迹中刷新&a可疑沙子&r.--]

You can place the egg into the world and it will slowly hatch into a &dSnifflet&r. This takes around 20 minutes to hatch normally, but can be placed on a Moss block to double the hatch speed, taking only 10 minutes to hatch.[--你可以将鸡蛋放入世界,它会缓慢孵化成&d烟熏炉&r。这通常需要20分钟才能孵化,但可以放置在苔藓块上,使孵化速度翻倍,只需要10分钟。--]

The Snifflet will eventually grow into an adult &dSniffer&r that can sniff up items like &2Torchflower Seeds&r or &2Pitcher Pods&r when they wander over blocks they can dig in.[--烟熏炉最终会变成一个成年&d筛网&r,当&2火花种子&r或&2抛光球&r漂泊在可以挖的方块上时,它可以闻到像&2火花种子&r或&2抛光球&r这样的物品.--]
You can breed 2 adult Sniffers by using Torchflowers.[--你可以使用火花来繁殖2只成年狙击手。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests69.title: We've Struck &bDiamonds&r![--我们有truck&b钻石&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests69.descri: Diamonds are one of the best materials to use for tool crafting, but also allows you to visit new dimensions like the Nether![--钻石是工具制作的最佳材料之一,但也允许你访问下界的新维度!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests70.title: &cTo The Nether&r![--&c到下界&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests70.descri: With a Diamond tier pickaxe, you'll be able to mine &dObsidian&r. Obsidian can be used to create a portal to the &cNether&r.[--使用钻石级镐,你就可以开采&d黑石&r.黑石可以用来创建一个前往&c下界&r的传送门.--]

The portal frame can be many different sizes, but most go with the basic \"Door\" shape. This is a hollow 4x5 shape using a minimum of 10 Obsidian. You don't have to use Obsidian for the corners, just the portal frame itself![--传送门框架可以有很多不同的尺寸,但大多数使用基础的“门”形状。这是4x5的空体,使用至少10个黑石。你不需要在角落使用黑石,只是传送门框架本身!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests71.descri: While holding your Spellbook, you can press C to open up the spell creation page.[--手持法术书时,你可以按C键打开法术创建页面.--]
Each spell must have a form. You start off with 3 basic forms: Projectile, Self-cast, and Touch.[--每个法术必须有一个形态。你从3个基本形态开始:弹射物、自我施放和触摸。--]
For the Effect, this determines what happens when you cast the spell. You can have up to 9 effects per spell.[--对于效果,这决定了你施放法术时会发生什么。每个法术最多可以有9个效果.--]
For starters, you have Harm and Break.[--首先,你具有伤害和破坏。--]
Select one Form and one Effect, name your spell, and click create![--选择一个形态和一个效果,命名你的法术,然后单击创建!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests71.tasks0: Creating Your First Spell[--制作你的第一颗法术--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests72.descri: In the bottom left of your screen, you'll see a bar. This bar is your mana pool![--在你的屏幕左下角,你会看到一个酒吧。这个酒吧是你的魔力池!--]

There are several ways to increase your mana pool, or increase the efficiency of your spells as you progress through the mod. Upgrading your spellbook can also increase your mana![--有几种方法可以增加你的魔力池,或者随着你通过mod而提高法术的效率。升级你的法术书也可以增加你的法力!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests73.title: &c&lI want to explore new dimensions&r&r[--&c&l我想探索新的维度&r&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests73.descri: Embark on a thrilling journey beyond the familiar landscapes of the Overworld.[--在主世界的使魔之地上进行令人振奋的旅程。--]

This quest invites you to step through mystical gateways and discover new dimensions teeming with untold mysteries, unique resources, and formidable inhabitants. [--这个任务邀请你跨过神秘传送门,发现新的维度,充满了无法描述的神秘、独特的资源以及强大的居民。--]
Arm yourself with courage and curiosity as you unlock the secrets of these otherworldly realms.[--当你解锁这些异界世界的秘密时,用勇气和奇点武装自己。--]
Your adventure into the unknown awaits—will you rise to the challenge and become a true dimension explorer?[--你进入未知维度的冒险正在等待——你将接受挑战并成为真正的维度探险家吗?--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests73.tasks0: I want to explore new dimensions[--我想探索新的维度--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests74.title: &kThe Black Market&r, &amore tips&r[--&k黑市&r,&a更多提示&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests74.descri: The &0&kBlack Market&r&r is the ultimate testing ground for your ingenious Create automations. Here, you can exchange the fruits of your mechanical mastery for unique items &cnot found anywhere else&r.[--&0&k黑市&r&r是您创造自动化的终极测试地。在这里,您可以将机械精通的果实换成其他任何地方都找不到的特殊物品&c.--]
You can use a &9task screen&r and a &9task screen configurator&r to automate.[--你可以使用&9任务屏幕&r和&9任务屏幕配置器&r来自动化.--]
NEED SUGESTIONS ON WHAT U LIKE TO AUTOMATE TO SUBMIT TO MARKET.[--需要查看什么我喜欢使用鼠标的模具。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests74.tasks0: &l&6Unlock Chapter: The Black Market[--&l&6解锁章节:黑市--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests75.title: The Joy of Cooking[--烹饪的快乐--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests75.descri: Stoves are a good-looking and very useful campfire alternative. Together with a Cooking Pot, it can help you prepare the most delicious meals in the game.[--炉子是一种很好看和非常有用的营火选择。它与烹饪锅一起可以帮助你准备游戏中最美味的餐具。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests76.title: Storage[--存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests76.descri: If you are looking for extra large but specialised storage space in a block, check out Storage Drawers.[--如果你在方块中寻找额外的大型但特殊的存储空间,请查看存储抽屉。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests76.tasks0: Any Storage Drawer[--任意存储抽屉--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests77.title: &l&aEnchantment Industries[--&l&a附魔工业--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests77.subtit: Start of the exp journey[--经验之旅的开始--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests78.descri: The &6item drain&r has the ability to take liquid out of a container and then it stores it until it it is piped out into a container[--&6物品排出器&r可以从容器中取出液体,然后存储它,直到它被管道注入到容器中--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests79.descri: The &6disenchanter&r has the ability to take enchants off of armour and store the xp it collects as liquid xp that can then be solidified to be consumed to be used again, it will be really helpful to have at a mob farm for armour drops. Standing on a &6disenchanter&r will take levels from the player and turn them into liquid[--&6解魔师&r可以将盔甲附魔并存储其收集的xp作为流体xp,然后可以固化以再次使用,在生物农场获得护甲掉落物确实很有帮助。站在&6解魔师&r上会从玩家那里取出等级并将其转化为流体--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests80.title: Disenchanting Enchanted Golden Apples[--解魔附魔金苹果--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests80.descri: When placing an &6Enchanted golden apple&r onto a &6disenchanter&r it will remove the enchanted aspect and give you a &eregular golden apple&r back and store the xp as liquid xp, that xp can be tranfered into a tank for later storage[--当将&6附魔金苹果&r放入&6施魔人&r时,它会移除附魔要素,给你一个&e普通金苹果&r,然后作为流体xp存储 xp,xp可以转成储罐,供以后存储--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests81.descri: Either &6nuggets of experience&r or &6heaps of experience&r will be fully consumed and turned into their liquid form[--&6经验粒&r或&6经验堆&r将被完全消耗并转化为其液体形态--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests82.title: Disenchanting Enchanted Items[--解魔附魔物品--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests82.descri: Any &6enchanted item&r can be placed on a disenchanted and it will take the xp and store it as liquid and you will get what you put that was enchanted back, so &6enchanted book&r will give you a book back, or &6an enchanted piece of armour&r will give you the armour piece without any enchantments[--任意&6附魔物品&r都可以放置在去附魔的身上,它会拿xp作为液体存储,你会得到你放的附魔物,所以&6附魔书&r会给你一本书,或者&6附魔护甲&r会在没有任何附魔的情况下给你护甲片--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests83.subtit: Stealing the precious liquid xp[--窃取珍稀的液体 xp--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests83.descri: To get the liquid xp from the &6bottle o' enchanting&r you need the item drain, it will give you back the bottle after it has drained the xp[--要从&6魔杖o附魔&r中获得流体经验,你需要物品排出,当它耗尽了xp后,它会把瓶子还给你--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests84.title: Dispensing XP onto the player[--将经验输出到玩家身上--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests84.descri: Once you have the xp stored in a tank, all you need to get the xp orbs to fall back onto the player all you need is a pump and pipe with nothing on the end this will pull the liquid xp down and dispense the orbs for the player to pick up[--一旦你将xp存储在储罐中,你只需要一个泵,一个没有末地的管道,就可以把流体xp拉下并分配玩家的宝珠来拾起--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests85.subtit: Making Bottles o' Enchanting[--制作附魔瓶--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests85.descri: With a spout attached to the tank of liquid xp via pipes, you will be able to put the liquid back into bottles either by right clicking bottles onto a depot or having bottles put on a belt line underneath the spout[--将液体通过管道连接到液体xp的储罐上,您可以通过右键单击储罐或将瓶子放在喷气管下方的传送带线上将液体放回瓶子中--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests85.tasks0: Spouting XP back into bottles[--将经验注入瓶子--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests86.subtit: Enchanted Book Duplication kind of[--附魔书的复制类型--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests86.descri: The &6printer&r will take any enchanted book by right clicking on it to save the enchantments you want to print onto new books.[--&6冲刺机&r会通过右键单击它来保存任何附魔书来保存你想打印到新书上的附魔.--]
As long as the printer is given enough liquid xp it will make a duplicate of the book you have given it[--只要给它足够液体xp,它就会复制你给它的书--]
You can also duplicate books you have written in by giving it the written book, then giving the &6printer&r liquid ink &a(made in the mixer)&r[--您也可以通过提供笔记本来复制您已经写好的书,然后提供&6冲刺机&r液体墨水&a(在搅拌机中制作)&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests87.descri: With the &6enchanting guide&r you can give it a book that you want it to store the enchantment of.[--你可以用&6附魔指南&r给它一本你想要它存储附魔的书.--]

Once you have done that, you can then shift and click a &ablaze burner&r to turn it into a &ablaze enchanter&r this will make it so it can receive liquid xp to be able to enchant items.[--一旦你这样做了,你就可以shift并单击&b熔岩燃烧器&r来将其变成&b熔岩附魔器&r,这样它就可以得到液体xp来附魔物品.--]

To give it the item you want it to enchant you can either right click the &ablaze enchanter&r or setup a belt line with it placed somewhere in the middle of it[--要给它你想要附魔的物品,你可以右键单击&b烈焰附魔器&r,或者用它放置在它中间的某个地方来设置一条腰带线--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests88.subtit: In a mixer you need liquid xp, a lapis and a glow ink sac[--在搅拌机中,你需要液体xp、青金石和荧光墨囊--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests88.descri: &bHyper enchanting&r let's you go above the normal enchantment limit in the base game.[--&b强力附魔&r让你超过基础游戏中的普通附魔限制.--]

To be able to mix it you will need to super heart a &6blaze burner below the basin and mixer&r you do this by feeding the &6blaze burner&r a blaze cake. You will get 10% of the liquid xp back in &bhyper experience liquid&r[--要搅拌它,你需要给&6烈焰人燃烧室&r一个&6烈焰人燃烧室&r一个烈焰人燃烧室&r一个烈焰人蛋糕喂食&6烈焰人燃烧室&r来做这个.你将在&b强力经验液&r中获得10%的流体经验&r--]

You can pump the &bhyper experience liquid&r into the blaze enchanter and then give when enchanting it will enchant the tool 1 level higher than the book given to the &6blaze enchanter&r[--你可以将&byper 经验流体&r泵入烈焰附魔器中,然后在附魔时给工具附魔,其等级比给&6烈焰附魔器&r的书高1级--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests89.subtit: Full enchanting with liquid XP[--&2用流体经验完全附魔--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests90.title: &aGetting&r &dMagical III&r [--&a获得&r &d魔法III&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests90.descri: &6Forbidden and Arcanus&r introduces exciting new methods to obtain improved armor, enchantments, and more![--&6禁忌和奥术&r引入了令人振奋的新方法来获得更好的盔甲、附魔等等!--]

Although there isn't an in-game guidebook, we've created a dedicated chapter for this mod. Plus, you'll find many items from Forbidden and Arcanus useful in your Create adventures.[--虽然没有游戏内指南,我们为这个mod创建了一个专用章节。加之,你会发现许多来自禁忌和奥卡诺斯的物品在你的创造冒险中很有用。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests90.tasks0: &l&6Unlock Chapter: Forbidden and Arcanus[--&l&6解锁章节:禁忌和奥术--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests91.title: &6New Combat Mechanics[--&6新的战斗动力--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests91.descri: Combat mechanics were altered by the &6Better Combat&r, &6Dodge Roll&r, &6Shield overhaul&r and&6 Shield Expansion&r mod.[--战斗机械由&6更好的战斗&r、&6豆腐卷&r、&6护盾升级&r和&6盾牌扩展&rmod改变.--]

Weapons each weapon has its own attack animation and time, comsecutive attacks will perform combos and you can hold attakc button to keep attacking continuosly.[--每个武器都有自己的攻击动画和时间,共击性攻击会执行连击,你可以按住阿塔克按钮来持续攻击.--]

Shields have new mechanics and like bashing: Attack while blocking to perform a shield bash. This will stun the target for 1 second, unless it's a boss[--护盾有了新的动力,就像击杀:在挡住时进行攻击以进行护盾击退。这将使目标眩晕1秒,除非它是一个Boss。--]
The mod adds traditional tiers to shields and introduces two new mechanics, Off-Guard Cooldown and Parrying![--mod为护盾添加了传统等级,并引入了两个新的机械师,即场外保护冷却和格挡!--]
Press R to roll. You can roll into any direction you are heading. This is crucial to dodge attacks during boss fights![--按R键滚动。你可以滚动到任何方向。这是在Boss战斗中躲避攻击的关键!--]
The combat roll ability has 20 seconds cooldown by default.[--战斗卷轴能力默认有20秒冷却。--]
Cooldown of your combat roll ability can be seen on the main UI.[--在主UI上可以看见你的战斗滚轮能力冷却。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests91.tasks0: Yes, I'm ready to fight![--是的,我准备好战斗了!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests92.descri: Item comes in pairs, and allows the player to seek out another player to whom they've given the second stone.[--物品是成对的,允许玩家寻找另一个他们已经给第二个石头的玩家。--]
Right-clicking the stone sends a particle trail in the direction of the player.[--右键单击石头,向玩家方向发送粒子足迹。--]
Getting closer to the target player will also make them glow pink, allowing you to easily spot them.[--靠近目标玩家也会让它们发光粉红色,让你轻松发现它们.--]
Using a map will also reveal the other player on it.[--使用地图也可以揭示它上的其他玩家。--]
If the other player dies, your own heartstone will break, repairing itself only when the other players recovers it.[--如果另一个玩家死亡,你的心石会破碎,只有当其他玩家恢复它时才能修复自己。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests93.title: &6Multiplayer:&r Chunk Claiming[--&6涡轮机:&r区块认领--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests93.descri: You're able to claim chunks to protect your base(s). [--你可以认领区块来保护你的基地。--]

Open your inventory with &3\"e\"&r key and click on the map icon that is located top left in your inventory that says &bFTB Chunks Claimed Manager&r.[--用&3\"e\"&r键打开你的库存,并单击你库存中左上方的地图图标,上面写着&bFTB区块认领管理器&r.--]
Here yo can freely claim available chunks by just drawing on the map with your mouse.[--在这里,你可以通过鼠标绘制地图来自由获取可用的区块。--]
To unclmaim a chunk you do the opposite, just draw but hold right click instead.[--要解锁一个区块,你只需画,但按住右键单击即可。--]
For force loading chunks hold &a'leftshift'&r[--用于强制加载区块,按住&a'shiftshift'&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests94.descri: By right cliking on the ground, you can summon in a \"mirror\" that will, well, mirror the blocks you place down.[--通过右击地面,你可以召唤一个“幻影”来镜像你放置的方块.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests95.title: The Abacus[--算盘--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests95.descri: The Abacus can be used to count the distance between two blocks in a much faster and efficient way.[--算盘可以更快、高效地计算两个方块之间的距离。--]
By simply right clicking on one block and then hovering over the other block, it will give you the distance between those two.[--只需右键单击一个方块然后悬停在另一个方块上,它就会给你两个方块之间的距离.--]
This tool has a range of 48 blocks.[--这个工具有48个方块的范围.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests96.descri: You can sell and buy stuff from other players using a vending machine.[--你可以使用售货机向其他玩家出售和购买物品。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests97.title: &6Keep an eye out for this structure![--&6注意这个结构!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests97.descri: &6Molten Vents&r is a mod which adds a renewable source of the orestones.[--&6Molten Vents&r是一个增加了矿石再生源的mod.--]
&nSave it your map you will need it later and they are rare to find.&r [--&n保存你的地图,你稍后会需要它,它们是稀有的.&r--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests97.tasks0: &l&6Unlock Chapter: Renewable ores[--&l&6解锁章节:再生矿石--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests98.title: &2For those you want to 100%[--&2想要100%--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests98.descri: During your adventures, you'll not only find a wealth of artifacts and Rings of Ascension but also unique trophies that drops each mob you encounter at very low chance. [--在你的冒险中,你不仅会找到大量的星能神器和星能指环,还会找到一个在非常低的几率下掉落每个生物的唯一奖励。--]

If you manage to gather and complete all the items from each category, you'll be rewarded with a &6secret prize.&r Keep a keen eye out and collect them all to uncover the hidden rewards awaiting you![--如果你能收集并完成每个类别的所有物品,你将获得&6秘密奖励。&r留意并收集它们,以发现等待你的隐藏奖励!--]
&6&lArtifacts&r&r is a mod which aims to make exploration more rewarding by adding various powerful items that cannot be crafted.[--&6&l阿蒂法术&r&r是一个mod,通过添加各种无法制作的强力物品来提高探索的奖励。--]
The items added by this mod can be found in chests in vanilla structures.[--该mod添加的物品可以在原版结构中的箱子中找到.--]

All artifacts only have a few chests in which they can be found, so go out and explore! Additionally, a new underground campsite structure has been added. [--所有神器只有几个箱子可以找到,所以出去探索!此外,增加了一个新的地下营地结构。--]

&5Mimics&r occasionally spawn in these campsites instead of a chests, which are dangerous enemies that attack players that get too close. Mimics always drop a random artifact when killed.[--&5Mimics&r偶尔会在这些营地而不是箱子中生成,这些营地是攻击距离过近的玩家的安全敌人。在杀死时,Mimics总是会掉落随机的物品.--]
&c-> Rings of Ascension&r[--&c-> 升天之戒&r--]

&6Rings of Ascension&r is a mod that uses the Curios API to add 20+ new rings to your minecraft. Each ring has its own special effect that is activated when the ring is equipped.[--&6星芒指环&r是一个使用Curios API来为你的矿车添加20个+新戒指的模组。每个戒指都有自己的特殊效果,当装备戒指时激活.--]
Rings from this mod don't have a recipe and can only be found in specific locations.[--来自此mod的戒指没有配方,并且只能在特定位置找到.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests99.title: Chalk[--粉笔--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests99.descri: Chalk allow you to drawk marks for easier navigation in the caves or structures it comes in all colors.[--粉笔可以让你在洞穴或洞穴结构中绘制更简单的导航标记。--]

You can also draw a couple of different symbols using &6Right-click while sneaking &r to open a menu where you can choose desired symbol to draw. Some symbols can be unlocked by completing advancements.[--您也可以使用&6潜行右键&r来打开一个菜单来选择要绘制的符文.一些符文可以通过完成进度来解锁.--]
Marks can be made glowing by appying Glowstone Dust or Glow Ink Sac to Them.[--标记可以通过闪闪发光的荧石粉或荧光墨囊来发光.--]
&eChalk Box&r is a convenient way to store and use you chalks. [--&eChalk Fack&r是存储和使用粉笔的便捷方式.--]
- It can be opened by using it while not looking at any block or right-clicking in the GUI.[--- 它可以通过在GUI中不查看任何方块或右键来打开.--]
- Mark whill be drawn with leftmost chalk in order sneaking[---用最左侧粉笔来绘制标记,以潜行--]
- You can draw glowing mark with Chalk Box by adding glowing items in a spacial slot.[--- 你可以用粉笔盒绘制发光标记,方法是在平滑槽中添加发光物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests100.title: Storage Labels [--存储标签--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests100.descr: Labels functions similar to Item Frames but can adapt to all surfaces and be physically connected to any solid block no matter the shape.[--标签功能类似于物品框架,但可以适应所有表面,并且与任意方块进行实体连接。--]
By shift-clicking on a Label with an item you'll be able to change its image, showing that item you selected. [--通过shift单击带有物品的标签,您可以更改其图像,显示你选择的物品。--]
Can accept Glow Ink Sacks to make then glow in the dark[--可以接受荧光墨囊,在黑暗中制作然后发光--]
Can be colored with any dye. [--可以使用任何染料染色.--]
Using a Feather on them will display the item name. [--在它们上使用羽毛可以显示物品名称.--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests101.title: &6HELP NEEDED[--&6Help 需要--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests101.descr: Your feedback and assistance are invaluable to improving this modpack.[--您的反馈和帮助对于改进这个modpack很有价值。--]
For suggestions, bug reports, or if you're interested in contributing, please reach out to us on Discord. [--为了获取建议,bug Reports,或者如果你对贡献感兴趣,请在Discord上与我们接触。--]
Your support helps us make this modpack better for everyone![--您支持我们让这个modpack更好!--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests102.title: Craft a sleeping bag[--制作一个睡袋--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests102.descr: &6Comforts&r is a mod that adds sleeping bags and hammocks to Minecraft. These items can be used just like beds except they do not set a player's spawn point on use, safely preserving a player's spawn point at their home base.[--&6农夫&r是一个mod,为Minecraft添加睡袋和吊床。这些物品可以像床一样使用,除非它们不设置玩家使用时的出生点,安全保存玩家在他们家基地的出生点.--]
Hammocks are like an inverse bed, turning day to night.[--吊床就像一张反向床,日复一昼。--]
ftbquests.chapter.basics.quests103.descr: &6The Tome&r solves a single problem: managing all of your guidebooks.[--&6宝典&r解决了一个问题:管理你的所有指南。--]
The Tome allows many books to be combined into a single item and enables them to be retrieved when needed.[--宝典允许将许多书组合成单个物品,并允许在有需要时取出它们。--]
&nRight-click&r while holding Tome to open the book selection screen[--&n右键单击&r手持宝典打开书选择屏幕--]
&nShift + Right-click&r while holding Tome to convert to the book for the block you're looking at[--&nShift+右键单击&r手持宝典以转换为你正在查看的方块的书--]
&nLeft-click&r on air to revert a book back into the Tome[--&n左键单击&r在空中将一本书重新放入宝典中--]
&nShift + Q&r while holding the converted tome to eject a book from it[--&nShift+&&r手持转换的图腾以从中输出一本书--]
